# Rebirth and New Hope - Next.js Memecoin Website

## Project Overview
A minimalist black and white memecoin landing page built with Next.js. The site promotes embracing current market opportunities rather than dwelling on negativity.

## Project Setup Status
- [x] Create .github directory and copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Get Next.js project setup info
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Customize landing page
- [x] Install dependencies and compile
- [x] Create and run dev task

## Development Guidelines
- Maintain minimalist black and white aesthetic
- Keep design simple and focused on the message
- Use Next.js App Router
- Optimize for performance and accessibility
